## Public Static Functions

### rewrite() {#aa0dfcf92c2eba1cb8bb38be9ac1e6eef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static const SCEV &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ScalarEvolution.cpp&#125;::SCEVPredicateRewriter::rewrite (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; S, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevpredicate">SCEVPredicate</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; NewPreds, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevpredicate">SCEVPredicate</a> &#42; Pred)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Rewrites <code>S</code> in the context of a loop L and the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> predication infrastructure.

If <code>Pred</code> is non-null, the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression is rewritten to respect the equivalences present in <code>Pred</code>.

If <code>NewPreds</code> is non-null, rewrite is free to add further predicates to <code>NewPreds</code> such that the result will be an AddRecExpr.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp/#l14790">14790</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/scalarevolution-cpp">ScalarEvolution.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
